title: CPU's Explosion
info:
(January 2006)

This is *NOT* AY!
This is a chiptune with sound-quality of ONE BIT (sound turn-on, sound turn-off, nothing more). Generated by Z80 chip with ULA chip as a transducer.

Author's note: "8 channels song, only tones, no drums. The 3,5Mhz CPU was working to death while playing this tune. ;)
This time I used software: ZX-7 Polyphonic Musical Instrument, Virtual Synthesiser and some stolen routine in machine code. Everything on Timex 48Kb."

http://mister_beep.republika.pl/music.html
